author: USA TODAY, Glenn Harlan Reynolds, Opinion columnist
title: Time to put China on lockdown for its dishonesty amid coronavirus crisis
description: China's response was inept, dishonest and utterly inconsiderate of the world. We need to teach the Chinese government a lesson.
content:
Astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and Ann Druyan, creator of National Geographic's "Cosmos" series, discuss the importance of science in age of COVID-19.
